p: Last but not least, it must be emphasized that within our gut there is also a viral component that interacts with the microbiota and the intestinal mucosa. Although studies evaluating the possible effect of food NP on this component are scanty, initial data obtained in vitro suggest that Ag-NP can alter the abundance of several viral species[ 94]. Since these species can be hosted by different categories of bacteria (commensal or pathogenic), changes in intestinal viriome can, in turn, cause alteration in the microbiota itself.
